item.description:
January 19

There has been a change in Movies.,

We are going to see “A Haunted House” instead.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2243537/

www.imdb.com/title/tt2243537/

“Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home,

but soon learn a demon also resides there.

When Kisha becomes possessed,

Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track –

turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters

for help.”

So if you wanted to see TCSM – 3D instead, then

Please change your RSVP to No.  If you cannot make

It then please change your RSVP to No.

The movie is scheduled to start at 7:20 but with previews

It might be closer to 7:45.

We will meet in front of the room where the movie

Will  be playing.

I will be wearing green pants and jacket.

I have a slight beard, wear glasses,

look like my profile photo

and height is around 5’ 8 1/2”.

If Friendlies is still open  after the movie

Then I might be going there for a meal

In case anyone else wants to come.

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. See additional details,

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone@ A Haunted House in Wallingford
